root.name: Chou Mahou Tairiku Wozz
root.description: OverviewChou Mahou Tairiku Wozz (The Magical Land of Wozz) is a JRPG developed by Red Company and was published by Bullet-Proof Software in 1995 for the Super Famicom. The game's defining feature is the ability to choose from three different protagonists that lead to one of the game's three endings. The Magical Land of Wozz was never officially released in English but a translation patch was released by Translation Corporation on December 3, 2006.
